text: Daniel Mkandawire (born 26 December 1951) is a Malawian former high jumper and triple jumper. Daniel competed in the men's high jump at the 1972 Summer Olympics in Munich, where he finished in 36th place with a height of 1.90 metres. He also holds the Malawian national record for the triple jump with a distance of 14.30 metres which he set in 1970. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:Malawian male high jumpers Category:Olympic athletes of Malawi Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1972 Summer Olympics
title: Daniel Mkandawire
